name: Technologist Media
overview:
Technologist Media Inc. (TMI) is an online media publishing company which publishes open source projects and research content from user groups and software developer events. TMI works in the community to display and distribute results from diverse technical sessions and “hackathons” organized by TMI in a creative and open format.

Dedicated to serving the technology community by supporting open development and community research, TMI reaches a wide technical audience including Android, iPhone, Flash, Air, Web, and OS developers.

TMI produces technical research projects, press and video journalism, developer outreach events, and web and mobile applications.

TMI’s online media and open source projects enable technologists and engineers to more easily develop applications in the fields of augmented reality and mobile development.
